codeEditorNavigationInfo.description: Hint how to exit the code editor using the keyboard, as the Tab key is used to insert indentation
codeEditorNavigationInfo.message: To go to previous or next form element, press

conditionActiveLabel.message: Whether the tabs are active in their windows

conditionCurrentWindowLabel.message: Whether the tabs are in the current window

conditionLastFocusedWindowLabel.message: Whether the tabs are in the last focused window

conditionOnlyForFirsTabLabel.message: Only for the first tab matched

createShortcut.description: Button text leading to the shortcut creation page

extDescription.message: Chrome extension allows you to run your scripts on any website using keyboard shortcuts when the browser window is minimized

hideAdvancedOptions.description: Button text, when clicked, additional filtering options for the page list will be hidden

initialization.description: It is displayed when the page with options is still uninitialized

notSpecified.description: Placeholder displayed instead of the specified shortcuts

showAdvancedOptions.description: Button text, when clicked, additional page list filtering options will be shown
